prod_long_desc:
Haul the helicopter to the airfield with the Chopper Transporter, featuring a flatbed truck with orange warning beacons and long-tread tires, and a helicopter with a tinted cockpit and spinning rotors. This 3-in-1 LEGO® Creator model can be rebuilt into a tractor or an off-roader, or combined with other small-scale LEGO Creator vehicles for endless play scenarios.
Features a flatbed truck with 2 orange warning beacons and long-tread tires, plus a helicopter with a tinted cockpit and spinning rotors.
Truck comes with a green, dark-green and grey color scheme.
Helicopter comes with an orange, white and black color scheme.
Load the helicopter onto the truck and head for the airfield!
Spin the rotors and take to the air!
This set offers an age-appropriate building experience for ages 6-12.
Includes more than 120 LEGO® bricks.
3-in-1 model: rebuilds into a tractor or an off-roader.
Chopper Transporter (with chopper loaded) measures over 2” high, 6” long and 3” wide.
Tractor measures over 1” high, 3” long and 3” wide.
Off-Roader measures over 1” high, 2” long and 1” wide.
Combine with the 31040, 31041 and 31045 mini-vehicle sets for extended play.
